subNode:value.scalar:string: customer` ADD `id_risk` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT "1"
customer` ADD `outstanding_allow_amount` DECIMAL( 10,6 ) NOT NULL default "0.00"
customer` ADD `show_public_prices` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL default "0"
customer` ADD `max_payment_days` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL default "60"
